meanings.definition: A member of the mystical knightly order in the Star Wars films, trained to guard peace and justice in the universe.
meanings.sent1: The jedi protected the galaxy from evil forces.
meanings.sent2: Luke Skywalker became a jedi after his training with Yoda.
meanings.sent3: The jedi and the Sith had an epic lightsaber battle.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom and bravery made her a true jedi in the eyes of many.
meanings.sent5: The jedi's connection to the Force gave them incredible abilities.

meanings.definition: A person who possesses exceptional skill or talent in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: She was a jedi in the art of baking delicious cakes.
meanings.sent2: The young musician was a jedi on the guitar, impressing everyone with his skills.
meanings.sent3: The jedi of gardening could make any plant thrive with their green thumb.
meanings.sent4: His expertise in coding made him a jedi in the world of technology.
meanings.sent5: The chef was a jedi in the kitchen, creating culinary masterpieces effortlessly.
